definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

(coll.) to scam sb by setting up an "accident" in which one appears to have sustained damage or injury caused by the scam victim, then demanding compensation (variations include putting "expensive" porcelain in a place where it is likely to be knocked over by passers-by, and stepping into the path of a slow-moving car)
erhua variant of 碰瓷|碰瓷[peng4 ci2]
fine ceramics (used for dental implants, synthetic bones, electronics, knife blades etc)/advanced ceramics/engineered ceramics

sentences.english: The technological chain of producing heat-resistant porcelain with the local ban-cite was narrated in particular.
sentences.chinese: 主要敘述採用本地紅牆石試製耐熱瓷的工藝過程。

sentences.english: A porcelain Guanyin seated on a lotus flower over breaking waves.
sentences.chinese: 一尊瓷觀音端坐在蓮花瓣上，蓮花下是波濤紋。

sentences.english: Conclusion The thickness of porcelain laminate veneers has less effect on the stress distribution.
sentences.chinese: 結論瓷貼面厚度對其載荷後應力分佈影響較小。

sentences.english: From a technical point of view JingDeZhen reached its highest level of achievement in the Qianlong reign.
sentences.chinese: 乾隆朝景德鎮工藝瓷的製作達到了歷史上的最高水平。

sentences.english: The Ding Kiln porcelain appears at first in the Five Kingdoms period in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 定窯瓷最初出現在五代時期，盛於北宋初。

sentences.english: My company is specializing in the production of porcelain ceramic art, gift ware .
sentences.chinese: 我公司是專業生產陶瓷藝術瓷，禮品瓷。

sentences.english: China dishes retain heat longer than metal pans do.
sentences.chinese: 瓷碟子保溫的時間要比金屬盤久。

sentences.english: There is porcelain vase of blue on windowsill , inserting Huang Yanyan's chrysanthemum.
sentences.chinese: 窗臺上有着藍色的瓷花瓶，插着黃豔豔的菊花。

sentences.english: The glaze of blue and white porcelain is transparent and the base is thin and light.
sentences.chinese: 這種瓷的釉質透明如水，胎體質薄輕巧。

sentences.english: Some slight changes were made in the temps and then taken to the ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 在臨時貼面與製作到瓷貼面的過程中有輕微的改動。

sentences.english: The attributes of ancient pottery and porcelain are very complicated and the content is substantial.
sentences.chinese: 古陶，瓷文物的屬性很複雜，內容十分豐富。

sentences.english: AIM To investigate effects of the bonder on the bond characteristic of porcelain and cast titanium.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察粘結劑對鈦瓷結合性能的影響。

sentences.english: Wall brick is told strictly should belong to fictile , floor tile is porcelain goods normally.
sentences.chinese: 牆磚嚴格講應屬於陶製品，地磚則通常是瓷製品。

sentences.english: The problem of porcelain housed arrester is analyzed and the measures of resolution are given.
sentences.chinese: 分析了瓷套式避雷器存在的問題，提出瞭解決的措施。

sentences.english: Diopside rock is a functional raw material for high frequence porcelain.
sentences.chinese: 透輝石礦是高頻瓷的一種實用原料。

sentences.english: Tooth-colored porcelain will cover the metal crowns.

definition: celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze
a type of clay found in the region of Yixing 宜興|宜兴[Yi2 xing1], used to make Yixing stoneware, with its distinctive russet or dark purple coloring
bone china (fine white porcelain made from a mixture of clay and bone ash)
